com.basho.riak.client.bucket

Class RiakBucket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.bucket.RiakBucket

  • public class RiakBucket
extends Object
    Wraps a DomainBucket strongly typed for IRiakObject.

    A convenience class stroring , retrieving IRiakObject from Riak without specifying a pass through Converter for each operation.

    TODO add per operation CAP properties. Add Retrier and ConflictResolver.
    Author:
    russell
